org.hornetq.jms.client

Class HornetQXAConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hornetq.jms.client.HornetQConnectionForContextImpl
      • org.hornetq.jms.client.HornetQConnection
        • org.hornetq.jms.client.HornetQXAConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, javax.jms.Connection, javax.jms.QueueConnection, javax.jms.TopicConnection, javax.jms.XAConnection, javax.jms.XAQueueConnection, javax.jms.XATopicConnection, HornetQConnectionForContext

    public final class HornetQXAConnection
extends HornetQConnection
implements javax.jms.XATopicConnection, javax.jms.XAQueueConnection
    HornetQ implementation of a JMS XAConnection.

    The flat implementation of XATopicConnection and XAQueueConnection is per design, following common practices of JMS 1.1.

    Author:
    Howard Gao
